message: The QUALITY_MGMNT field for indicator 9-b-1, translated into all languages

data.en: UNIDO published a handbook for statisticians involved in the regular industrial statistics programmes of NSOs or line ministries (Industrial Statistics - Guidelines and Methodology). It describes the statistical methods related to the major stages of industrial statistics operation. Moreover, UNIDO has established a quality management framework based on the internationally recognized guidelines recommended by IRIS to ensure quality of statistical products.
